column4: Is there any way to map a keyboard shortcut to move a window to the upper right corner?
compiz MAY be able to do it

here are some to put the window on the left and right like the snap feature in Windows 7. If you play with them you can make the window behave how you like: http://www.clickonf5.org/linux/use-aero-snap-windows7-feature-ubuntu/6956
